text.div:
This code system http://terminology.hl7.org.au/CodeSystem/location-type defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
VI VirtualServices are delivered at a virtual location, such as by phone or on-line.

name: LocationType
title: Location Type AU

contact.name: HL7 Australia Patient Administration Working Group
HL7 Australia Orders and Observations Working Group

description: Additional concept codes for location type defined for use in an Australian context. These codes are used as extensions to the HL7 International code set.

concept.definition: Services are delivered at a virtual location, such as by phone or on-line.
